Text:
Sorry guys my schedule has been crazy lately. I've made this the first thing I do when I get home even though I would really like to be enjoying the good weather that's left here.

But I do know how important the show is so I'm compromising. I should return to posting at 12PM EST tomorrow.

Invites are still available at our site if you want to get the show 30-40 minutes earlier. Visit WDM Network and click "How To Obtain An Invite" to join.

Peace & Love.
Nothing to apologize for wush.  Thanks so much for continually giving us all the great Howard Stern.  We'll take it whenever we can get it!
